description.en:
Ye-jin, who has persistently studied in a challenging environment to gain admission to a prestigious university but has a score of 0 in dating. She tries various things with the hope of finding a boyfriend...

Just when Ye-jin's only male friend and a physical education major, Hyeon, who is wearing the mask of friendship, appears in front of her and gradually becomes obsessed with her.

Can Ye-jin achieve both her dream of raising her family through her high education and her dream of dating while pursuing her education?

altTitles.zh-ro: Měng Shòu Xiá: Jī Jiǎ Jì Yuán
Meng Shou Xia: Ji Jia Ji Yuan

description.en:
The story takes place on Earth nearly a thousand years in the future. After a devastating war between artificial intelligence and humanity, monstrous creatures known as "Tai Sui" roam the land, drastically altering the natural environment and social order. In response, humanity developed "BOX"—a series of advanced technologies related to mysterious boxes. These "Beast Boxes" became humanity's key allies in the fierce resistance against their enemies.

Elites capable of "resonating" with their Beast Box partners are known as "Beast Box Masters." Among them, a once-overlooked Beast Box Master named Liu Ma is unexpectedly chosen by a small dinosaur-like Beast Box named "Dio." Together, they begin their mission to protect the city-state. During grueling training, Liu Ma meets several other Beast Box Masters and their Beast Box companions. The group is soon tasked with reinforcing "Vermilion City," marking the beginning of their epic journey.

Jisoo was raised with the belief that 'women should be modest.' Her one-night stand with Hyunwoo, whom she first met at a club five years ago, was meant to be a brief fling... Then one day, she unexpectedly crosses paths with him at her workplace! What? He's the new CEO starting today?! Jisoo feels uneasy around Hyunwoo, who shares a part of her embarrassing past, but as Hyunwoo, who only knows how to be direct, continues to approach her, Jisoo's feelings slowly begin to change...

After the abduction of his brother Kotaro by the Machine Empire, Teppei Takamiya joins forces with X, one of several highly-advanced, artificially intelligent machines known as B'ts (pronounced 'beat'), to rescue him.

Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

description.en:
In the 21st century, just when the human race needs new heroes, the Lucifer Hawks enter Earth's dimension. The members of the A.M.P., six young women with incredible powers, are set to defend the human race against these monstrous entities from another world.  
  
(from: Viz Comics)

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.en: Takamiya Honoka, a regular student, sits next to Kagari Ayaka, the idol of the school, and a perfect girl in every way. Her fans are hostile to the extent of harassing anyone who gets close to their princess, so Takamiya-kun is always in trouble. One day Takamiya is suddenly attacked by an unknown force, but he is rescued by a powerful sorceress of fire, who happens to be… Kagari Ayaka herself!
description.pt-br: Takamiya Honoka é um estudante comum que por acaso se sentou perto de Kagari Ayaka, a “Princesa” da escola. Ele nunca falou uma palavra com ela, porém, um dia, quando a vida de Takamiya estava em perigo, Kagari aparece para salvá-lo vestida de bruxa. Dessa maneira é revelado que Kagari é uma bruxa e que Takamiya está sobre a proteção dela. Ela irá protegê-lo de qualquer perigo que apareça.

altTitles.ja: ディザインズ

description.en:
Beyond the natural world lies a breed of abnormal beings... “H.A.”, or “Humanized Animals”. They are a hybrid of human and animal, "designed" at the genetic level. 
Possessing astonishing physical capabilities, these H.A. are deployed into scenes of intrigue by certain ambitious individuals, seeking to showcase their true value. 

For what purpose did humans design these beings? Behind it all lies a grand plan connected to the future of humanity!

My life of comparing myself to my perfect older sister is over. Now I'm going to live as the main character! Shin Seon-ha, a freshman who entered college with big dreams. However, I thought there was something strange in that department, but I never thought they were all vampires!!... Sunha's bloody college life with her fellow vampires begins.

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…

description.en:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!

On the eve of civil chaos during the last years of Sui dynasty, with the rise of a reign of terror around the country, various peoples' feelings of grudge and animosity develop.
description.id: Mengambil latar belakang di akhir Dinasti Sui (581–618), munculnya banyak kekacauan di seluruh negeri. Dao Ma dan anaknya Xiao Qi, mencari uang dengan cara menjadi pengawal bayaran atau membunuh orang yang menjadi incaran pemerintah.

In war, men become beasts. War makes gods out of beasts. When war ends… where do the gods go? Where can they rest their weary heads?

Wolves walk the forest of despair, the wasteland of lamentation, the sea of bitterness, in the time of dark and light. To kill those that were once their friends.

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

description.en: After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

description.en: Hikari, a highly popular model hailed as the "Cutest Girl in the World"... The mysterious model turned out to be an ordinary high school student named Harema Kouki! Kouki is troubled by the fact that he feels he's too cute when cross-dressing and can't find other girls cute... But by a twist of fate, he realizes that his classmate, Amamiya-san, is much cuter than him—!?  An overly confident cross-dressing boy × a diligent girl who shines when polished, A youth romantic comedy overflowing with "cuteness"—!
description.id: Hikari, model yang sangat populer dan dijuluki sebagai "Gadis Termanis di Dunia" Model misterius ini ternyata seorang siswa SMA biasa bernama Harema Kouki! Kouki merasa terganggu oleh fakta bahwa dia merasa dirinya terlalu imut ketika ber-crossdressing dan tidak dapat menemukan gadis-gadis lain yang imut... Namun, karena takdir, dia menyadari bahwa teman sekelasnya, Amamiya-san, jauh lebih imut darinya! Seorang anak laki-laki yang terlalu percaya diri saat Crossdresser × seorang gadis rajin yang bersinar saat dipoles, Komedi romantis anak muda yang dipenuhi dengan "keimutan" -!
description.ja:
『世界一可愛い女の子』と称される大人気モデルのhikari——。
謎に包まれた彼女の正体はどこにでもいる普通の高校生、晴間光輝だった！
女装した自分が可愛すぎて他の女子を可愛いと思えないと悩んでいる光輝だったが、
ひょんなことからクラスメイトの雨宮さんが自分より『可愛い』ことに気づいてしまい——!?

自信ありすぎ女装男子×磨けば光る健気女子
『可愛い』が溢れる青春ラブコメディ——！

---

description.vi: Hikari, một người mẫu rất nổi tiếng với biệt danh "cô gái dễ thương nhất thế giới" hóa ra là một học sinh trung học tên Kouki. Cậu lo sợ rằng mình sẽ không thích ai được nữa bởi vì làm gì có người con gái nào dễ thương hơn mình. Nhưng đọc lại tên truyện đi ông nhõi, chú mày xếp thứ 2 thôi.

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 孤立編

description.en:
Late April 2097—the use of strategic-class spells doesn’t stop with the Brazilian military, as the Great Asian Alliance deploy Thunderclap Tower in the Gulf of Guinea. Magic fans the flames of war, which soon engulf the entire world. As public opinion inevitably turns against magicians as a whole, Edward Clark, a researcher of the USNA, proposes an expansive space development endeavor called the Dione Project to promote the peaceful use of magic. Taurus Silver’s name appears on the list of chosen candidates, which leads to people uncovering the truth—that this is in fact Tatsuya, throwing him and Miyuki into yet another trial.

Adaption of Light Novel 23.

altTitles.ja: 義妹生活

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
description.pt-br:
De colegas de classe a irmão e irmã, vivendo sob o mesmo teto.

Após o novo casamento de seu pai, Asamura Yuuta acaba ganhando uma nova meia-irmã, coincidentemente a beleza número um do ano escolar, Ayase Saki. Tendo aprendido valores importantes no que diz respeito aos relacionamentos homem-mulher através dos anteriores de seus pais, eles prometem um ao outro não ser muito próximos, não ser muito opostos e apenas manter uma distância vaga e confortável.

Por um lado, Saki, que trabalhou sozinha pelo bem de sua família, não sabe como confiar adequadamente nos outros, enquanto Yuta não tem certeza de como realmente tratá-la. Estando em terreno bastante igual, os dois aprendem lentamente a sensação confortável de viver juntos.

O relacionamento deles evolui lentamente de estranhos à medida que os dias passam. Eventualmente, isso pode acabar em uma história sobre o amor, pelo que sabemos.

description.en: Modern Japan is overrun by "vampires" who mimic and eat people. In order to hunt them down, there are girls who fight in secret with silver weapons in their hands! Among the vampire exterminators, there is a unit of "troublemakers," a.k.a. "Mazarasou." Newly assigned there is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. She meets a woman named Kaika Kiriya, who is one of the most "dangerous" women in the group. A painful, extreme, and sometimes friendship. Hunting, hunting, hunting!
description.ja: 人に擬態し、人を喰う「吸血鬼」が跋扈する現代日本。ヤツらを狩るため、銀武器片手に人知れず戦う少女たちがいた！駆除業者の中でも問題児が集まった部隊・即応六班――通称「まだら荘」。吸血鬼を引き寄せる「ごちそう」体質を持ち、人を遠ざけ生きてきた昴 玲央がそこで出会ったのは、まだら荘の中でも一際美しく一際ヤバイ女・紀里谷 開花でーー。

description.en: A boy named Shi Shan and his little sister were offered as sacrifice to a demon that has been haunting their village. They were rescued by a martial artist who exorcised demons. He took the siblings in as his disciples and taught them the art of cultivation and about the demons that dwell in this world.

title.en: Magical Girl Tsubame: I Will (Not) Save The World!

altTitles.ja: 対世界用魔法少女つばめ

description.en: The world is in danger! Who will rise to protect it? Introducing Tsubame, an ordinary high school student who dreams of becoming a magical girl. But if she has to choose between the world and her friends... A new adventure from Mapollo 3, the creator of PPPPPP! Buckle up for some passion, magical girls, and a dash of madness!

title.en: Tsuma ga Kanpeki Sugiru node, Chotto Midashite Ii desuka?

altTitles.vi: Tôi có nên chiều hư cô vợ hoàn hảo của mình?

altTitles.ja: 妻が完璧すぎるので、ちょっと乱していいですか？

altTitles.en: My Wife is Too Perfect, So Can I Disturb Her a Little?

description.en: Rikuto, an illustrator, and his wife Natsuki, a civil servant, have been married for a week. Their newlywed life has only just begun. His wife is too perfect in every way, but Rikuto can't forget the way he once saw her in a disheveled state. He wants to see her again in a disheveled state somehow, but he always ends up being defeated!
description.ja: ホントの妻[キミ]を見たいんだ。イラストレーターの夫・陸斗と公務員の妻・菜月は、結婚して1週間。まだまだ始まったばかりの新婚生活を過ごしていた。何事も完璧すぎる妻だけど、陸斗はかつて一度だけ見た彼女が乱れた様子が忘れられない。どうにかして彼女の崩れた姿を見たいと思うが、いつも返り討ちにあってしまうのであった！

description.en: A prince has been cursed to turn into a frog by a witch. Things went wild from there.
description.vi: Một hoàng tử bị biến thành con ếch bởi một mụ phù thủy. Chuyện diễn ra tiếp theo khá là kì cục.

altTitles.ja: 寄生列島

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed――. A parasite psycho-thriller by Edogawa Edogawa of "Ikenie Touhyou".

title.en: Did I Seriously Just Get Reincarnated as My Gag Character?!

altTitles.ja: ネタキャラ転生とかあんまりだ! THE COMIC

altTitles.ru: Мне кажется, или это похоже на реинкарнацию сюжетного персонажа?

altTitles.id: Gila sih, reinkarnasi jadi karakter lawak!

description.en:
Toru Aikawa, a college student who spends his days immersing himself in games because his daily life is so boring, was standing alone in a forest in a different world before he even could realize why. Moreover, it seems that he has reincarnated into the "Neta character" he made in a game. The Genderswap reincarnation of the strongest heroine packed with overflowing Chuunibyo and ideals!

The strongest genderswap reincarnation fantasy begins here !!

---

**Note:** A Neta character is a character whose action has captured the hearts of viewers and players and has been turned into a important part of the story.
description.id:
Toru Aikawa, seorang mahasiswa yang menghabiskan hari-harinya dalam permainan karena kesehariannya yang membosankan. ketika dia menyadarinya, dia sedang berdiri sendirian di hutan di dunia yang berbeda karena suatu alasan.. Selain itu, sepertinya dia telah bereinkarnasi ke dalam "karakter baru" yang dibuat dari bermain game….

bereinkarnasi menjadi yang terkuat yang dengan Chuunibyo yang meluap-luap dan juga cita-citanya!
description.pt-br:
Toru Aikawa, um estudante universitário que passa seus dias mergulhando em jogos porque sua vida diária é tão chata, estava sozinho em uma floresta em um mundo diferente antes que ele pudesse perceber o porquê. Além disso, parece que ele reencarnou no "personagem Neta" que ele fez em um jogo. A reencarnação Genderswap(troca de gênero) da heroína mais forte repleta de Chuunibyo transbordante e ideais!

A fantasia de reencarnação de troca de gênero mais forte começa aqui!

altTitles.ja: 月刊少女野崎くん

altTitles.es: Nozaki y su revista mensual para chicas

altTitles.th: นักเขียนหน้าตายนายโนซากิคุง

description.ar: تدور أحداث القصة تشيو ساكورا هي طالبة في المدرسة الثانوية، معجبة بزميلها أوميتارو نوزاكي، عندما تعترف بحبها له، يظن أنها معجبة ويعطيها توقيعه عندما تقول له إنها تريد أن تكون معه، يدعوها إلى منزله ويساعدها في تعلم رسم. تكتشف ساكورا أن نوزاكي هو في الواقع فنان شوجو مانغا مشهور يعمل تحت الاسم المستعار ساكيكو يومينو، توافق على أن تكون مساعدته من أجل الاقتراب منه.
description.de:
Chiyo Sakura ist hoffnungslos in ihren Klassenkameraden Nozaki verliebt. Doch als sie ihm ihre Liebe gesteht, gibt Nozaki ihr ein Autogramm, lädt sie zu sich nach Hause ein… und drückt ihr einen Pinsel in die Hand.

Zu ihrer Überraschung entpuppt sich Sakuras Schwarm als berühmter Mangazeichner, der romantische Liebesgeschichten für Mädchen zeichnet! Um ihm näherzukommen, beginnt Sakura, als seine Assistentin zu arbeiten. Und eh sie sich versieht, steht ihr Alltag auf dem Kopf…
description.en:
The boy of her dreams… is a girl's manga artist? To the eyes of high school student Chiyo Sakura, classmate Umetarou Nozaki–brawny of build and brusque of tongue - is a dreamboat! When Chiyo finally works up the courage to tell Nozaki how she feels about him, she knows rejection is on the table… but getting recruited as a manga-ka's assistant?! Never in a million years!

But for someone who makes a living drawing sweet girly romances, Nozaki-kun is a little slow on the uptake when it comes to matters of the heart in reality. And so Chiyo's daily life of manga making and heartache begins!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [MANGA UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/125)
description.es:
Aquel estudiante de bachillerato un poco brusco era dibujante de manga shôjo romántico.

Umetarô Nozaki es un estudiante un poco brusco. Chiyo Sakura, que también estudia bachillerato, está enamorada de él y un día hace acopio de valor y se le declara. Sin embargo, por algún extraño motivo, en vez de convertirse en su chica, pasa a ser su asistente de manga shôjo. ¡Una comedia que narra el día a día de Nozaki, que, aunque es estudiante, también es un mangaka popular!
description.fr: La lycéenne Chiyo Sakura est tombée amoureuse d'Umetarou Nozaki, un grand jeune homme à l'air imperturbable, voire benêt. Lorsqu'elle lui confesse ses sentiments, il la prend pour une de ses fans et lui fait un autographe. Lorsqu'elle lui dit vouloir toujours être à ses côtés, il l'invite dans son appartement et lui donne du travail à faire. Chiyo découvre que Nozaki est en fait un mangaka renommé, qui écrit sous le pseudonyme Sakiko Yumeno. Elle accepte de devenir son assistante en espérant pouvoir se rapprocher de lui. En travaillant sur son shoujo manga *Let's Fall in Love*, Chiyo rencontre d'autres camarades qui apportent leur aide ou servent d'inspiration à Nozaki-kun pour ses personnages.
description.id:
A, aku mau menembak cowok yang kusuka. Tapi saat berhadapan dengannya, yang keluar malah lain.

Tapi akhirnya, yang kudapat darinya adalah sebuah tanda tangan!?
Lho, lhoo..ternyata dia komikus komik cewek!?
description.it: Il ragazzo dei suoi sogni... è un disegnatore di manga per ragazze? Agli occhi della studentessa Chiyo Sakura, il suo compagno di classe Nozaki –rissoso, muscoloso e dalla lingua tagliente- è un vero sogno! Quando decide di dichiarargli, finalmente, i suoi sentimenti si aspetta di essere respinta… ma finire a fare l'assistente di un mangaka? Ma neanche in un milione di anni! Ma per qualcuno che si guadagna da vivere scrivendo di batticuori e patemi d'amore, Nozaki è… un po' lento di comprendonio per quanto riguarda la realtà. E così la vita di Chiyo, tra manga e amore, ha finalmente inizio...
description.ja:
無骨な男子高校生は、乙女な少女漫画家でした。

無骨な男子高校生「野崎梅太郎」。彼に恋をした女子高生「佐倉千代」は勇気を振り絞って告白するものの、何故か恋人ではなく少女漫画家のアシスタントになったのでした…。男子高校生でありながら人気少女漫画家でもある野崎くんの日常を描く、少女漫画家男子コメディー!!
description.ko: 과묵하고 듬직한 남고생 노자키 군. 그런 노자키를 남몰래 짝사랑하던 사쿠라 치요는 용기내어 고백을 하지만 돌아오는 것은 노자키의 사인이었는데…?
description.pl:
Nieokrzesany licealista okazuje się być autorem niewinnych mang shojo!
Chiyo Sakura zbiera się na odwagę i postanawia wyznać miłość Umetarou Nozakiemu, nieoględnemu licealiście, ale zamiast zostać jego dziewczyną, dostaje angaż w charakterze asystentki i od tej chwili razem tworzą komiksy. Oto komedia opowiadająca o codziennym życiu Nozakiego, profesjonalnego mangaki specjalizującego się w shojo!
description.pt:
Sakura Chiyo confessa seu amor pelo Nozaki-kun, mas ele a confunde como uma fã! Incapaz de transmitir seus sentimentos, as coisas começam a ficar complicadas quando Nozaki-kun a convida para ir à sua casa, onde ela descobre que ele é um mangaká de mangá shoujo. Sakura então decide ser a assistente de Nozaki-kun, a fim de se aproximar dele. Agora, Sakura tem que transmitir os seus verdadeiros sentimentos enquanto a sua relação com Nozaki se desenvolve!  


---
description.ru: Сакура пытается признаться Нозаки, а он дает ей автограф. Странно? Вовсе нет, ведь потом он сразу приглашает её домой, где Сакуру ждет сюрприз! Забавная история о парне, который рисует сёдзё, хотя совсем не выглядит знатоком девичьих сердец, и девушке, что всеми силами старается донести до него свои чувства.
description.th: นักเรียนมัธยมปลายหญิงชื่อซากุระ จิโยะแอบชอบเพื่อนร่วมห้องชายชื่อโนซากิ อุเมะทาโร่ แต่เมื่อซากุระสารภาพรักกับโนซากิ โนซากิกลับเข้าใจผิดว่าซากุระเป็นแฟนคลับจึงมอบลายเซ็นให้ เมื่อซากุระบอกว่าตนอยากอยู่เคียงข้างโนซากิ โนซากิก็เชิญซากุระมาที่บ้านแล้วให้ซากุระช่วยเขียนการ์ตูน ซากุระจึงได้รู้ว่าจริง ๆ แล้วโนซากิเป็นนักเขียนการ์ตูนแนวโชโจะชื่อดังที่ใช้นามปากกว่าว่ายูเมโนะ ซากิโกะ ซากุระยอมรับการเป็นผู้ช่วยเขียนการ์ตูนเพื่อให้ใกล้ชิดโนซากิ ระหว่างที่ทั้งคู่ร่วมทำงานเขียนการ์ตูนเรื่อง จงรัก. ก็ได้พบกับเพื่อนร่วมโรงเรียนคนอื่น ๆ ที่มาร่วมช่วยเขียนการ์ตูน และ/หรือเป็นแรงบันดาลใจให้เรื่องราวในการ์ตูน
description.tr: Sakura Chiyo,aşık olduğu Nozaki-kun'a hislerini söylemeye çalışır. Ama sıradan bi lise öğrencisi gibi görünen aslında ünlü bir Mangaka olan Nozaki onu bir fan'ı sanır.
description.vi:
Nam sinh cấp ba khô khan lại là tác giả truyện tranh thiếu nữ lãng mạn!

Nozaki Umetaro là một nam sinh cấp ba khô khan. Cô bạn Sakura Chiyo thích cậu và đã dồn hết can đảm để tỏ tình. Nhưng không hiểu sao cô không trở thành người yêu, mà thành trợ lý bất đắc dĩ cho cậu tác giả truyện tranh thiếu nữ này. Kể từ đó, hàng loạt tình huống khó hiểu, thậm chí… khó đỡ liên tiếp xảy đến.

Đây là câu chuyện hài hước về cuộc sống thường ngày của Nozaki, một nam sinh cấp ba đồng thời cũng là tác giả truyện tranh thiếu nữ nổi tiếng.
description.zh:
粗犷的高中男生，其实是纯情的少女漫画家。

女高中生佐仓千代喜欢同班的粗线条男生野崎梅太郎。她鼓起勇气向野崎表白，不知何故没有成为对方的恋人，反而成为了少女漫画家的助手……

描绘拥有双重身份的野崎君，身兼男高中生及人气少女漫画家的日常生活。男子少女漫画家的喜剧开演！
description.zh-hk:
粗獷的男高中生「野崎梅太郎」。 
暗戀他的女高中生「佐倉千代」雖然鼓起勇氣告白，
但不僅求愛未果，還陰錯陽差成為少女漫畫家的助手……
描繪具有雙重身分的野崎同學，高中男生兼人氣少女漫畫家的日常生活。
少女漫畫家男子喜劇!!

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

altTitles.en: By Chance, a Match Made in Heaven
Match Made in Heaven by Chance

altTitles.th: โชคชะตานำพารัก

altTitles.ja: いきなり結婚生活

altTitles.vi: Lớ Ngớ Vớ Phải Tình Yêu

description.en: ‘How long have i been laying down at home…?’ Han Jia, who is turning 32 this year (she’s a freelancer who’s still doesn’t have a full-time job/jobless), suffers because of the pressure given by people around her that keep telling her to get married. Around the same time, Jin Mincheol, her childhood friend who came to Jia’s hometown for holiday, is having the same problem. Then, the two people got married just like that. Now that they have married….. ‘Huh? We match each other more than i thought?’
description.es: Jia Han, una trabajadora independiente sin trabajo de 32 años, está cansada de que sus padres insistan con que se case y se vaya de la casa. Cuando se encuentra con un amigo de la infancia, Mincheol Jin, que siente la misma presión por parte de sus padres, dice sin pensar que casarse sería una buena solución para los problemas de los dos. Pero no se imaginaba que él aceptaría su propuesta y, de repente, se encuentra de camino al altar. ¡Una historia sobre un romance inesperado que no podrás dejar de leer!
description.fr: Jia, 32 ans, sans-emploi, vit toujours avec ses parents. En ayant marre de la pression de sa famille, par un coup de tête, elle fait une demande en mariage à son ami d'enfance, Mincheol, qu'elle vient tout juste de recroiser après des années. À sa grande surprise, celui-ci accepte directement sa proposition et d'un jour à l'autre elle se trouve mariée à Mincheol. Cette union improvisée perturbe Jia, mais, petit à petit elle découvre qu'ils sont en fait... parfaits l'un pour l'autre?!
description.hu: Han Jia, jelenleg szabadságon lévő szabadúszó, közismertebb néven munkanélküli. Jia a Holdújévet a nyaggatásával ünneplő családja elől elmenekül "friss levegőt szívni", amikor összefut egy régi ismerőssel. Jin Mincheol, aki a nyomi szomszédkölyök volt egykor Jia szemében, majdnem hasonló cipőben jár, ugyanis az ő családja is azt várja, hogy párt találjon végre magának. Ekkor támad egy zseniális ötlete hősnőnknek, és kezdetét veszi a két lökött főszereplő közös élete.
description.id: Sudah berapa tahun kamu tinggal di rumah orang tua? Han Jiah (pengangguran) yang tahun ini berusia 32 tahun, hari ini juga menderita karena masih belum menikah dan bekerja. Tiba-tiba Jim Minchul, sahabat kecil Jiah muncul dan mereka memutuskan untuk menikah!?? Ternyata mereka berdua malah lebih cocok dari yang diperkirakan?!
description.ko:
집에 얹혀산 지 몇 년 차더라..? 
올해 32살을 맞이한 한지아(일하지 않는 프리랜서/무직)는 주변의 결혼하라는 눈칫밥에 오늘도 고통받는데.. 
때마침 명절을 맞이하여 고향에 내려온 소꿉친구 민철 또한 같은 고민이 있었으니.
그러면 쉬운 해결 방법이 있잖아?!? 그렇게 홧김에 결혼한 두 사람.
그런데 막상 결혼해 보니... 어라?? 생각보다 너무 잘 맞는다?!
description.th: ‘ฮันจีอา’ ฟรีแลนซ์สาววัย 32 ปีที่เบื่อหน่ายกับคำถามเรื่องแต่งงานของพ่อแม่ บังเอิญพบกับเพื่อนสมัยเด็ก ‘จินมินชอล’ หนุ่มเนิร์ดที่โดนคำถามจากพ่อแม่เรื่องนี้เช่นกัน คนโสดทั้งสองตัดสินใจจะหยุดคำถามเหล่านี้ด้วยการแต่งงาน! หรือว่านี่จะเป็นบุพเพสันนิวาส?
description.zh:
厌倦被家人催婚的两人！
就这样稀里糊涂结了婚！
今年32岁的韩智雅没工作，不知在家蹭吃蹭喝了多少年，一直被催婚……正好在过节的时候，智雅遇到了回老家过节的儿时玩伴珉哲。她发现珉哲也有相同的困扰。因此，他们俩一气之下选择结婚……
description.pt-br:
"Há quanto tempo estou deitada em casa...?"

Han Jia, que está completando 32 anos este ano (ela é uma freelancer que ainda não tem um emprego registrado), sofre com a pressão das pessoas ao redor, que ficam dizendo para ela se casar. Na mesma época, Jin Mincheol, seu amigo de infância que veio para a cidade natal de Jia para passar as férias, está tendo o mesmo problema. Então, as duas pessoas se casaram, simples assim. Agora que eles se casaram… 

"Huh? Nós combinamos mais do que pesávamos?"
description.zh-hk: 因為沒工作而一直住在老家的韓智雅總是會被家人催促結婚，就在她瀕臨崩潰的時候，遇到了有相同煩惱的兒時玩伴……

description.en: A totally normal countryside story involving minor

altTitles.ja: 聖獣伝承DARK ANGEL

description.en: Dark is a young man destined for great things. He's next in line to be the magical guardian of his country, but before he can assume that responsibility, he'll have to confront demons, angels, friends, and his own insecurities.

title.en: After Transmigrating as the Biological Mother's Villainous Devil King

altTitles.en: I Became the Villain Demon King's Mother

altTitles.zh: Chuan Cheng Fanpai Mowang De Qin Niang Hou
穿成反派魔王的亲娘后

description.en: The Lord is 5 years old, one more year of his mother will die, the Lord will be completely blackened, destroyed the earth. Su Yitang, who wore the mother of the Lord's King, said: "It's too hard for me! Who's his dad? Is there anyone in charge?
This museum's treasured collection is a slew of strange comics!
description.zh: 这个博物馆，珍藏着许多奇怪的漫画！

description.ar: لقد قتلت من قبل الخونة وبعد أن عدت . قررت هذه المرة أن أكون صداقة معهم . . لأنه إذا أصبحت صديقه لهم ، فلن يقتلوني . لكن " هل يمكنك فقط السماح لي بالذهاب عندما ينتهي الأمر لقد أملت رأسي وسألت ، لكن العيون المحدقة بي قد تعمقت بعطش مجهول " ماذا يمكنني أن أفعل ؟ ليس لدي أي نية لترككِ تذهبين . " ردود الفعل هذه غريبة نوعا ما ؟ "
description.en: Arabella is a forgotten outcast princess who vomits blood whenever she moves. After being killed during the rebellion against the oppression of the imperial family which inherited the dragon's blood, she returns to the time before her 20th birthday. Realizing that she must survive until her 25th birthday in order to stop the regression cycle, Arabella decides to look for a way to cure her illness, even if it means seeking answers from the rebel forces themselves.
description.fr: Arabella est la princesse oubliée et maladive qui vomit du sang dès qu'elle bouge. Elle revient après avoir été tuée lors d'une rébellion contre l'oppression de la famille impériale dirigée par celui qui a hérité du sang du dragon. Elle doit survivre jusqu'à son 25e anniversaire pour s'assurer que sa régression est terminée. Arabella décide de trouver une réponse auprès des rebelles afin de prolonger sa vie.
description.it: Arabella è una principessa dimenticata che vomita sangue ogni volta che si muove. Dopo essere stata uccisa durante la ribellione contro l'oppressione della famiglia imperiale, ritorna al tempo prima del suo ventesimo compleanno. Rendendosi conto che deve sopravvivere fino al suo 25° compleanno per fermare il ciclo di regressione, Arabella decide di cercare un modo per curare la sua malattia, anche se questo significa cercare risposte dalle stesse forze ribelli.
description.ko:
움직이면 피를 토하는 잊혀진 찬밥 황녀 아라벨라. 
드래곤의 피를 이어받은 황실의 압제에 맞서 일어나는 반란 사건 때 죽임을 당한 후 회귀한다. 
자신이 25살의 생일까지 살아남아야 회귀가 끝난다는 것을 알게 된 
아라벨라는 생명 연장을 위해 반란군에게서 답을 찾기로 결심한다.
description.pt: Arabella é uma princesa esquecida que vomita sangue sempre que se move. Depois de ser morta durante a rebelião contra a opressão da família imperial, ela retorna à época anterior ao seu 20º aniversário. Percebendo que deve sobreviver até seu 25º aniversário para interromper o ciclo de regressão, Arabella decide buscar uma forma de curar sua doença, mesmo que isso signifique buscar respostas das próprias forças rebeldes.
description.vi:
Arabella là một cô công chúa bị lãng quên, luôn nôn ra máu khi di chuyển. Một cuộc nổi loạn đã diễn ra để chống lại sự áp bức bóc lột của hoàng gia. Về sau khi bị giết chết liên tiếp, cô phát hiện ra rằng quá trình trở về quá khứ sẽ chỉ kết thúc nếu cô sống sót cho đến sinh nhật thứ 25 của mình
.
Arabella quyết tâm tìm ra câu trả lời từ phe nổi dậy để kéo dài sự sống.
description.zh-hk:
阿拉貝拉，是一位因為體弱容易吐血而被遺忘受冷落的公主。

在受繼承龍族血統的皇室壓迫而發生的叛亂事件的時候，遭遇死亡之後復活。

明白自己到25歲的生日復活就結束的阿拉貝拉，決心為了延續生命從叛軍那裡尋找答案。

altTitles.ja: もどきども
そんな家族なら捨てちゃえば?

altTitles.vi: Một gia đình như vậy có đáng để giữ lại không?

altTitles.en: Is A Family Like This Worth Keeping?
If It's A Family Like That, Why Don't You Throw It Away?

description.en: "My wife made a rule for our home: 'Don't talk to Dad.'" "Isn't that domestic violence? Weren't you sending me an SOS for help?" Reitarou Shinotani has been long ignored by his wife and daughter, left all alone, and forced to do nothing but eat and sleep in a small, dark, cramped room in the house. What fate awaits him, as he aims to revitalize his family...?
description.vi:
Bị vợ và con gái lạnh nhạt, Shinoya Reitaro buộc phải sinh hoạt trong cô độc ngay trong chính căn nhà của mình. 
"Không được bước qua ranh giới, 
Không được ăn uống chung, 
Không được dùng nhà vệ sinh, 
Không được bắt chuyện, 
Không được tạo ra tiếng ồn khi đóng/mở cửa..." 
Cho đến khi anh gặp được một người phụ nữ mà anh không nhớ rõ đã từng gặp qua ở đâu. 
"Một gia đình như vậy có đáng để giữ lại không? Sao anh không vứt quách nó cho rồi đi?" 
Liệu số phận của người đàn ông đang đứng giữa hai sự lựa chọn này rồi sẽ ra sao?

altTitles.ja: 悪逆覇道のブレイブソウル

description.en:
“I will never cuckold you!”

A young man reincarnated as a villain character in a game tries to live an honest life to avoid a bad ending, but for some reason he ends up becoming friends with the heroines...!?

“Dungeon Brave Soul”
It is a game that drew in many men, and at the same time, it is a game that broke the brains of many men with its sequel's NTR, depression, and bad ending.

All because of the overwhelmingly hated antagonist of “Dunbure 2”――

 The young man who was reincarnated as Zenon Baskerville, however, in order to avoid the bad ending according to the scenario of "Dunbure 2", He tries to live honestly...!?

title.en: Tensei-saki wa Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag wa Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.ja: 転生先は悪役令嬢の父親でした～可愛い娘の死亡フラグは全部折ります～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei-saki ha Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag ha Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.en: I Was Just Reincarnated As The Villainess's Father ~I'll Snap All Of My Cute Daughter's Death Flags~

description.en: Ryuichi, a 44-year-old single father, gets into a traffic accident while protecting his high school daughter Mizuho, ​​who ran away from home after an argument. After losing consciousness and accepting his death, he finds himself in the body of a young man he had never seen before. While panicking, he finds a girl who looks exactly like Mizuho when she was a child, and as he sorts out the situation, it seems that he has been reincarnated as the father of the game's villainess…!?
description.ja: 44歳のシングルファザーの龍一（りゅういち）は口論の末、家を飛び出した女子高生の娘・瑞穂（みずほ）をかばい、交通事故に遭ってしまう。意識が遠のき死を覚悟した後に目覚めると、見知らぬ若い男性の姿になっていた。動揺する中、小さい頃の瑞穂そっくりな少女がいて、状況を整理していくと、どうやらゲームの悪役令嬢の父親に転生してしまったようで……!?

altTitles.ja: 三咲くんは攻略キャラじゃない

altTitles.ja-ro: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara ja Nai

description.en: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
description.ja: ここはギャルゲーの世界。 親友キャラ・三咲泉の使命は、主人公・季原晴太のヒロイン攻略のサポート…のはずが、 肝心の季原は何故か三咲を攻略するつもりで――!? 「男の子のままヒロインになってくれ！」 友情？愛情？男の娘ハッピー胸キュンコメディ!!

ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ジョジョリオン
ジョジョリオン
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第8部 ジョジョリオン カラー版
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: JoJolion

description.en: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

altTitles.en: My Second Life Is a  Healing Life?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

description.en: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.
description.ja: まったく素直じゃない後輩・守山ちゃんは、自分にアプローチさせようと野洲先輩を挑発したり、時には大胆にアクションしたり…!?
description.pt-br: Yasu gosta da sua kouhai, Moriyama, que é ao mesmo tempo extremamente assertiva, inexpressiva e extremamente passiva-agressiva.
